title: Enhance button animations and Integrations section with premium smooth interactions

requirements.text: Apply smooth transition animations to all buttons across the website with 'transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out' to eliminate instant or harsh movement

quotes: Apply smooth transition animations to all buttons: transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out, No instant or harsh movement

acceptanceCriteria: All buttons have transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out applied
No buttons exhibit instant state changes

acceptanceCriteria: Buttons scale to 1.05 on hover with smooth transition

requirements.text: Implement click interaction with subtle press effect that scales down to 0.96 on click and bounces back smoothly, preventing sudden jumps or lag

acceptanceCriteria: Buttons scale down to 0.96 when clicked or pressed
Scale returns smoothly to original size after release
